title: Diamond Floral Studs: A Touch of Telugu Elegance
features: Delicate floral design inspired by Telugu flower motifs. The diamonds are pavé-set to maximize brilliance, resembling a blooming flower. The gold has a subtle Hyderabadi polish, giving a warm, lustrous finish.
colors: Warm Yellow Gold and Sparkling White Diamonds.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift for engagements and weddings (వివాహం). Suitable for office wear and evening outings.
description: These diamond studs offer a blend of modern design with subtle Telugu cultural inspiration. The high-quality diamonds ensure lasting brilliance, while the 18K gold provides durability. An exquisite addition to any jewelry collection, representing timeless elegance and Hyderabadi craftsmanship.
